revised_title: The Effects of Volatile Substances and Gases on Mould Fungi Growth
tldr: The author investigates the effects of volatile substances and gases on the growth of mould fungi, focusing on the germination and growth-retarding substances. They found that certain volatile substances, like acetaldehyde, can significantly affect the growth rate of mould fungi, with different effects on germination, growth, and colony size. This research has practical implications for food preservation and storage.
